articles.description: Natasha Reddican, 31, was found by her boyfriend when he returned from work to their home in Salford, Greater Manchester, on February 27.
articles.content:
A television producer on ITV's The Jeremy Kyle Show hanged herself after she struggled to find work when the programme was axed, an inquest has heard.
